title: Evaluation of Inulin and Polyphenol Content and the Cytotoxicity ofCichorium intybusL. var.foliosumRoot Extracts Obtained by Pectinase- and Pressure-Assisted Extraction.
abstract: Cichorium intybusL., a member of the Asteraceae family, has numerous health-promoting properties that categorize its preparations as functional foods and herbal medicines. Most previous research focused on the root ofC. intybusvar. sativum(industrial chicory) as a rich source of inulin, while the witloof variety (C. intybusvar.foliosum) is less explored.
